aboutpara: Iâ€™m a Frontend Developer with experience in frontend development, web design, and WordPress. Iâ€™ve helped businesses build modern web experiences with technologies like React, Next.js, and Shopify.

resume.description: I am James Guevara Gamboa, a passionate web developer with experience in frontend development and web design. I graduated as a Technician in Web Design and Development from CETAV and have worked on projects such as Audiophile, an e-commerce platform, and Travel Haven, an Airbnb clone. I have collaborated on innovative initiatives like 'Human Brush.' My skills include technologies such as JavaScript, React, and Next.js, as well as SEO optimization and WordPress customization. I am committed to creating effective and engaging digital solutions.
